0.line1: Do you have a project we can help with?

2.line1: Thank you for the provided details!
2.line2: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

first.title: Cyclorama
first.description: A curved white wall, ideal for creating seamless images and experimenting with light and shadows.
first.usage: Professional photoshoots, music videos, commercial campaigns.

second.title: Modern Living
second.description: A contemporary-style sofa, perfect for elegant photos and relaxed sessions.
second.usage: Editorial photography, stylized portraits, family shoots.

third.title: Vintage
third.description: Two vintage-style sofas that bring class to every photo.
third.usage: Thematic photography, fashion shoots, podcast recordings.

fourth.title: Dining
fourth.description: Designed in a natural style, it brings warmth and authenticity to every image.
fourth.usage: Lifestyle photography, food product commercials, culinary shoots.

service.content: The studio is divided into 4 distinct areas, perfect for photo shoots or available video production. With a pastel aesthetic and modern amenities, every detail is designed to inspire and support.

overlay.screen1: We are a creative and experienced team offering photo-video services, with a personalized approach for every project.
overlay.screen2: We ensure flexibility and effective communication. The studio is conveniently located in Chișinău, Ciocana district.

rules.0: Minimum booking time: 4 hours for photo shoots, 6 hours for filming.
rules.1: Working hours: Monday-Friday, 09:00-21:00. Weekend bookings require an additional fee of 80 EUR/day.
rules.2: Audio recording: We cannot guarantee pure sound due to possible echo.
rules.3: Food and drink consumption: Prohibited in the completely white studio.
rules.4: Use of dishes: Used dishes must be washed, otherwise a fee of 30 EUR applies.
rules.5: Booking duration: Includes preparation and cleanup, ending 10 minutes before the reservation’s end.
rules.6: Overtime hours: From 23:00 to 09:00, a fee of 30 EUR/hour applies.
rules.7: Additional cleaning: For decor usage that leaves excessive dirt, a 50 EUR fee applies.
rules.8: Access to the white studio: Protective shoe covers or clean white footwear are mandatory.
rules.9: Excess trash: More than one 240L container incurs a 25 EUR fee.
rules.10: Damages: Financial responsibility falls on the renter, and equipment will be checked by the administrator at the end of the booking.

benefits.2: Bang & Olufsen audio system with AirPlay.
benefits.4: Stands, custom makeup table, clothing rack, large mirror, steamer.
benefits.5: Technical support from our team for any need, from equipment setup to post-production.

projects.subtitle: PORTFOLIO
projects.content: Each project we create tells a unique story, crafted with passion and attention to detail. Our portfolio reflects expertise, innovation, and a commitment to exceeding client expectations.
